actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to revise the boundary of Colorado National Monument in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate lands within specified areas for addition to the Colorado National Monument, Colorado, and to acquire any lands so designated or interests therein. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to revise the boundary of Colorado National Monument in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
